features.title: Main Features
features.quickSummariesDesc: Convert YouTube videos into concise summaries.
features.timeSavingDesc: Reduce viewing hours with quick summaries.
features.forEveryoneDesc: Perfect for students, professionals, and curious minds.
features.diverseContentDesc: Summarize a wide range of YouTube content, from lectures to documentaries.
features.valuableInsightsDesc: Extract key points and insights from any video.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.step1Desc: Simply copy and paste the YouTube video URL you want to summarize.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Select between key points, paragraph, or full page.
howItWorks.step3Desc: In seconds, receive a concise and accurate summary.

testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.quote1: Resumyt has saved me hours. Now I can get key information in minutes.
testimonials.quote2: Perfect for preparing presentations. Resumyt extracts the key points I need.
testimonials.quote3: Thanks to Resumyt, I can keep up with programming tutorials without spending hours watching videos.
testimonials.quote4: An essential tool for anyone wanting to learn quickly.
